alert.note: Alert for Garrard (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 06 at 6:16PM EDT until July 06 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL LINCOLN AND SOUTHEASTERN GARRARD COUNTIES... At 616 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Boone to 11 miles west of Bee Lick, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crab Orchard, South Fork, Kings Mountain, Jumbo, Ottenheim, Broughtentown, Geneva, Cartersville, Preachersville and Halls Gap. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
